body.p:
To better align with cable entry in the Reactor Cabinet, Input Bus Bars can be relocated to any of (3) positions:
Bottom front (standard position)
Bottom rear
Top rear Input Bus Bar Positions
Input Bus Bars cannot be relocated to the top front position because door components are in the way.

To relocate Input Bus Bars, do the following:
Remove (4) bolts attaching the Input Bus Bars brackets to the Reactor Cabinet frame. Retain attachment hardware.
Do not detach the cables connecting the reactor to the bus bars. Do not change the orientation of the Input Bus Bar assembly. Brackets allow attachment from front or back.
Use retained (4) bolts and associated attachment hardware to reattach the Input Bus Bars to your selected location.
Input Bus Bar Attachment
